thread.title: Great location, friendly staff and amazing corner room!
thread.title_full: Great location, friendly staff and amazing corner room! - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LDoon
title: Great location, friendly staff and amazing corner room!
text: I stayed here for my birthday weekend with my friend. It was my 40th birthday, which my friend had told the hotel and I was so surprised to find sweets and a handwritten card from the staff on the bed! We had also been given a corner room and it was amazing! I have since recommended this hotel to my friends and will definitely visit again soon!! It is attention to detail like this that draws people back time and time again! Thanks!
